1100010100010001 1000010100101010 1 -> sum: 0100101000111100, cout: 1

0101000101000010 0011011111100110 1 -> sum: 1000100100101001, cout: 0
0010100011110010 0110000101011100 1 -> sum: 1000101001001111, cout: 0
1111100100100011 1101000000001111 1 -> sum: 1100100100110011, cout: 1
0011101011101101 1010001100011001 0 -> sum: 1101111000000110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
